definition: to bludgeon/to hit with a big stick
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to tag sb with unfair label/power word
to grab sb by the pigtail/to seize on weak points/to exploit the opponent's shortcomings
to seize and subject to public criticism (form of persecution during the Cultural Revolution)

to obtain confessions by compulsion/confession under duress
to denounce/to censure/to rebuke
to criticize/to refute
to drag sb before a public meeting to denounce, humiliate and physically abuse them (esp. during the Cultural Revolution)
to attack sb by exposing faults/to denounce
not distinguishing red-green or black-white (idiom)/not to distinguish between right and wrong

definition: bad element/bad egg
to criticize (as a matter of principle)
to grab sb by the queue (i.e. hair)/to seize on weak points/to exploit the opponent's shortcomings
